title: Glycolic Acid Facial Cleanser: Alpha Hydroxy Face Wash with AHA, Vitamin C & Rose Hip to Exfoliate Dry, Sensitive Skin, Reduce Acne & Brighten Age Spots for Women & Men
description: When applying the face wash gel, notice how lightweight it is & how it gently exfoliates the skin as you wash daily. You will soon see your skin transform. Dry skin will become smooth & supple, fine lines become less pronounced & age spots will lighten giving way to radiant, glowing, healthy skin. We formulated the perfect blend of natural ingredients: Fruit Extracts, Antioxidants like Vitamin C, Vitamin B5 (Panthenol), Burdock, :Lavender, Rosehip Oil. We ensure our superior face cleanser will gently cleanse, exfoliate and repair your skin. And, we give you the exclusive ebook, Education is critical to creating the best skin care habits, leading to healthy gorgeous skin. Order now & consider getting 2 bottles, 1 for you & 1 as a present for someone you love.
